item.description: had a bit of free time so i answered 100 questions about making this website, being a webmaster, and that sort of fun stuff.

item.description: new music recap talking about my fav music from 2025 and stuff i discovered that year!

item.title: 10.jan.26 - new journal log + other minor updates!
item.description: added a new journal log reflecting on 2025 + finished my 2025 scrapbook and added some highlights of the year + various minor updates throughout pages such as: art, photobook, and fashion

item.title: 25.dec.25 - picrews collection + code snippet page
item.description: FINALLY made my picrews collection page! doing this page made me realize i have made 78 picrews.... i really do love doing those. it came with my love for fashion games + new code snippets page where i share how i made the rainbow links on hover! happy holidays everyone!

item.description: my thoughts on this uni semester classes and the start of my winter break!
